long_description: Handcrafted in Portland, Ore., the Danner Ridgemaster GTX Boots feature nubuck leather and nylon uppers and waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX(R) linings for excellent performance on rugged trails. 100% waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX linings keep your feet dry on the wettest trails. Durable nubuck leather and lightweight nylon uppers endure frequent use on rugged trails; leather toe and heel wraps increase abrasion resistance. Shock-absorbent EVA midsoles provide support and cushioning. Fiberglass shanks provide torsional rigidity and stability on uneven terrain. Vibram(R) Rivot TFX(R) outsoles provide superior grip and mobility on hiking trails. Extended cuffs give the Danner Ridgemaster GTX Boots an overall height of 8 in.
short_description: Handcrafted in Portland, Ore., the Danner Ridgemaster GTX Boots feature nubuck leather and nylon uppers and waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX(R) linings for excellent performance on rugged trails.
